description: The Isle of Man should get enough doses of the new Oxford jab to cover the entire population.
title: Isle of Man to receive population-based share of new vaccine
title_page: Isle of Man to receive population-based share of new vaccine - BBC News
maintext: Quantities of each of the vaccines are made available based on the Isle of Man's population as a percentage of the overall population of the UK and the Crown Dependencies, meaning the island will receive 0.13% of the total vaccinations ordered by the UK should the government choose to roll them out to everyone.
